original: intros pDst t cid lli llt d d' m H. apply handleRequestVote_cases in H. destruct H as [H|[H|[H [H1|H1]]]]. - left. apply handleRequestVote_currentTerm_monotonic in H. omega. - left. subst. apply handleRequestVote_currentTerm_monotonic in H. omega. - right. subst. split. * pose proof (advanceCurrentTerm_term d t). destruct (lt_dec (currentTerm d) t). + apply advanceCurrentTerm_currentTerm in H. omega. + unfold advanceCurrentTerm in H. destruct (currentTerm d <? t) eqn:Hart. ++ rewrite Hart in H. omega. ++ apply Nat.ltb_ge in Hart. omega. * destruct H1. -- subst. apply handleRequestVote_votedFor in H. auto. -- destruct H. exfalso. omega.
